Address.label: Address
Address.value: 25 ST. JAMES'S STREET, LONDON, SW1A 1HA, United Kingdom

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: CNH Industrial is an equipment and services company. The company develops, manufactures and sells specialized machines and services for the farming and construction industries, and supplies replacement parts and accessories. The company operates through three distinct segments: Agriculture, Construction and Financial Services. Its Agriculture segment designs, manufactures, and distributes a full line of farm machinery and implements. Its Construction segment designs, manufactures, and distributes a full line of construction equipment. Its Financial Services segment offers retail note and lease financing to end-use customers for the purchase of new and used agricultural and construction equipment and components.
